title: Gatti's
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, Italian, Buffet, Salad bar, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. As of April 2013, no vegetarian restaurants or health food stores are located in town. Franchise pizza place with a large amount of locations in the U.S, offers a large buffet bar which includes the option to special order any kind of pizza, including cheese-less. Has a salad bar, marinara spaghetti sauce, baked potatoes and other vegan choices. When traveling west on Hwy 90 through town, it can be found by turning left at the Motel 6 sign and is on the corner at the end of the first block.
